mapper.insert: insert into wms_location_plan (warehouse_id, area_id, location_id, receipt_list_id, goods_id, num, status, remark, create_name, update_name, create_time, update_time) values (#{warehouseId}, #{areaId}, #{locationId}, #{receiptListId}, #{goodsId}, #{num}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{createName}, #{updateName}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime});
